content: In the Forest of Wolves, you'll find a Wolf Guai called Guangzhi. This Yaoguai Chief is optional but the wolf guards one of the bells necessary to unlock another secret in the chapter. To make it even more worthwhile to fight him, he drops a great Transformation Spell called Red Tides. This is a powerful transformation to have unlocked so early on, with a focus on fire damage.
